data.name: Vendetta: Mafia Wars
data.detailed_description:
The year is 1940 and the rules of the game has changed. The underground world in the United States is reborn along with new bosses. As a real-time strategy game, our product offers you the atmosphere of those times with all its glory by placing you in the heart of the mob wars that shaped the USA. Form your family, manage your economy, forge alliances with other families to outsmart your rivals.

While everybody is talking about the war in Europe, you must reshape the criminal underground and will have a sit down with six families to do so. Take control of one of these families and select your crew to build your army! Create your criminal empire and run your family, expand your turf and protect it against rivals. You are free to choose which path to take to be the greatest; find allies and prove your worth to them or back stab all and show how power hungry you are. Ultimately destroy all and be the real king of the city!

  • Features:

    Real Time Strategy
    Engage in battles in real time against other crime families by experiencing the sense and the thrill of the era. Arm your organization and take over the city.

    Mission System
    As you are making a name for yourself in the underworld, gain experience, cash, special items and different rewards through various missions found in the city

    Economy Management
    Gain revenue from the turfs you take over. Organize the right business network while spending your winnings to manage and finance your family.

    Diplomacy
    As your turf and influence are growing, other crime families in the city will start to notice you. Having too many enemies might lead to your demise and put you in an early grave.

    Create Your Own Family
    Create your character and family, set up your crew and start making a name for yourself. Become one of the decisive bosses of the city by gaining more fame.

    Competitive Multiplayer
    With Multiplayer support, prove you are the best by battling against other players or against artificial intelligence while teaming up with your friends.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T or AMD FX 6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R7 260x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570K or AMD Ryzen 3 1300x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 or AMD R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
